issue.message: Overriding method should call `super.onRequestPermissionsResult`

Do not place Android context classes in static fields; this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `FarayanBaseApp` which has field `ctx` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields; this is a memory leak
This field leaks a context object
This field leaks a context object
